Hands on team coaching for React

Overview

Our friends at Lendesk asked us to assist their team with setting up the best possible foundations for building out a stellar Javascript application interface.

They required their application to be fast and give instant feedback on data entry for their users. This is a perfect use case to develop out the application using a front end Javascript Framework.

React Training

We were first told that the team were preparing to build out their interface with Angular.JS but had reservations around the nature to debug, adopt as a team and talk amongst the open source community was that version 2 would not be backward compatible was discouraging.

Our developer worked with them to highlight the advantages of React and how that would work with their application. To do this, spike based prototyping was carried out to ensure that

Work was carried out with their team so that decisions and knowledge was still held with their team. This allowed for them to continue development when our time was over for this project.
